summary: "The Social Network" is a 2010 movie about Facebook's creation, directed by David Fincher. Based on a book, it stars Jesse Eisenberg as Mark Zuckerberg. Filming started in 2010, premiering in New York in September. The film was a hit, earning $224 million and winning many awards, including three Oscars. It was praised by critics and is considered one of the best films of the 21st century. The writer, Aaron Sorkin, wants to write a sequel if Fincher returns to direct.
title: The Social Network
